abstract: Former New York Gov George E Pataki, who has announced his presidential candidacy, will bring unusually liberal social views, like support of gay rights and abortion, with him into the Republican field; such views may worsen his already long odds of victory in party that often prefers pugilistic and orthodox candidates.
lead_paragraph: The former three-term governor of New York acknowledges facing long odds, but being a moderate could give him a bit of hope for the New Hampshire primary.

headline.main: George Pataki Adds a Socially Liberal Voice to the Race for the G.O.P. Nomination
headline.print_headline: Pataki Adds a Socially Liberal Voice to the Race for the G.O.P. Nomination

snippet: The former three-term governor of New York acknowledges facing long odds, but being a moderate could give him a bit of hope for the New Hampshire primary.
